permissions: Any authenticated user can list change requests; non-admin results are limited to brokers in the user policy scope.
validation_notes: --organization must be in Type|ID format (e.g., Broker|123). --organization-id requires --organization-type unless the value already includes a Type|ID (contains |).

flags.name: --organization
flags.description: Filter by organization (format: Type|ID, e.g., Broker|123)
flags.validation: Must be in Type|ID format (e.g., Broker|123).

flags.name: --organization-id
flags.description: Filter by organization ID (requires --organization-type or Type|ID)
flags.validation: Requires --organization-type unless the value already includes a Type|ID (contains |).

flags.name: --organization-type
flags.description: Filter by organization type (e.g., Broker, Customer, Trucker)
